DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Painful Diabetic Neuropathy
DOC.detailed_description: Research Design : A randomized mixed factorial control design employ CBT plus standard pharmaceutical care ( CBT/SC ) compare standard pharmaceutical care ( SC ) treatment condition . Participants randomize equal number two condition . Repeated assessment key outcome domain occur pretreatment/baseline 12 , 24 36 week follow baseline . Methodology : Study participant evaluate pre-treatment ( baseline ) , 12 week post-baseline ( post-treatment ) 24 36 week post-baseline ( follow-up ) . Baseline assessment include neurological examination nerve conduction study confirm diagnosis diabetic neuropathy . The primary outcome measure pain intensity . Secondary outcome measure pain quality , pain-related disability , physical emotional functioning . Measures treatment feasibility also examine . Participants receive CBT attend 10 weekly , group treatment session 90 minute . A target sample size approximately 120 participant recruit .
